item.title: Build Hugo
item.description: Today, I built hugo blog with the PaperMod theme. I spent almost a day try featues of hugo templates, some seems worked while some failed. It was a good start anyway.
item.content:encoded:
Today, I built hugo blog with the PaperMod theme. I spent almost a day try featues of hugo templates, some seems worked while some failed.

It was a good start anyway.
